problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙O, P is the midpoint of arc BAC, PD ⊥ CD and it intersects ⊙O at A, if AC = AD = N_0, the length of AB is ()
raw_answer: 解:连接PCPBPA,过P做BA垂线于H点∵P为⁀{BAC}的中点∴PB=PC∴∠B=∠C,∠PHB=∠PDA,∴∠BPH=∠DPC,∵在△PBH与△PCD中,\begin{cases}∠B=∠C\\PB=PC\\∠BPH=∠DPC\end{cases},∴△PBH≌△PCD(ASA),∴BH=CD=2,PH=PD,∵在Rt△PHA与Rt△PDA中,\begin{cases}PH=PD\\PA=PA\end{cases},∴Rt△PHA≌Rt△PDA(HL),∴HA=AD=1∴AB=BH+HA=3．故选:B．
